application.name: mvic2isis
application.brief: Import New Horizons MVIC files into Isis format
application.description: This program will import FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) formatted files from the New Horizons MVIC instument into the ISIS format.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: A New Horizons MVIC fits file to be converted to an Isis cube
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename of a New Horizons MVIC file to be converted to a cube. This is expected to be a FITS formatted file.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons MVIC image in ISIS format.

parameter.name: UNDISTORTED
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the Error image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons MVIC Undistorted image in ISIS format. The Undistorted image must be in the first FITS extension (i.e., second image).

parameter.name: ERROR
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the Error image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons MVIC Error image in ISIS format. The Error image must be in the second FITS extension (i.e.,third image).

parameter.name: QUALITY
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the Quality image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will containing the New Horizons MVICI Quality image in ISIS format. The Quality image must be in the third FITS extension (i.e., fourth image).
